mapper.insert: INSERT INTO maoche_brand_lib_keyword (brand_lib_id, keyword, category_name, level_one_category_name, alias_names, tags, special_tags, status, create_by, update_by, create_date, update_date, remarks) VALUES (#{brandLibId}, #{keyword}, #{categoryName}, #{levelOneCategoryName}, #{aliasNames}, #{tags}, #{specialTags}, #{status}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks});
